metadata.title: CVE-2021-46790

platform: Open Enterprise Server 23.4

metadata.description: ntfsck in NTFS-3G through 2021.8.22 has a heap-based buffer overflow involving buffer+512*3-2. NOTE: the upstream position is that ntfsck is deprecated; however, it is shipped by some Linux distributions.
